phrases: Log on to www.ruri-subs.com or visit us at
The Princess's concert held in Grana was really exciting.
Of course, it was not only at the venue.
Those who watched the live telecast enjoyed themselves too.
Thank you for your time tonight!
Everyone is smiles and rising applause greeted the end of the concert,
and, together with the dawn, the citizens of Galette started heading back to Galette.
The citizens of Biscotti also returned to the land of Biscotti.
Sir Hero, Yuki, I would like to excuse myself and then head to the institute.
Well then, do say hello to everyone on my behalf.
How does the issue of the deportation ceremony look?
Well, the equation for the ritual was resolved this morning.
Once we are ready, we can start the deportation at any time, but...
One, the person who summoned him needs to perform the deportation ceremony.
Two, the period between the summoning and the deportation needs to be within sixteen days.
Three, the summoned hero is not allowed to take anything he received or achieved from Flonyard.
Four, once the hero is deported, he will never be able to return to Flonyard.
Does anyone else know about this?
The final date of deportation is... three days from now.
We have managed to come up with a way for you to return home.
According to the plan, you will be able to return home the morning of three days from now.
Well, that is what I want to say, but...
is there a catch to it?
A hero who has been summoned before
will never be able to come back to Flonyard.
And there is also the condition that you are not allowed to take anything you received in Flonyard.
This refers not only to material things but also includes knowledge and experience.
Even the memories of your time in Flonyard will be erased when you are deported.
So this is why... you have looked pale since yesterday.
I am just too worthless to be chief of the research institute.
I must have assumed things to be too simple.
I thought I could do it, no matter how difficult it was.
I was so sure something this depressing would not happen.
This is not your fault, Rico.
Positive thinking is one of your good points.
You have been getting along so well with the princess and everyone here,
and you have always been hanging out with me.
We were all getting along so well.
I do not want this to end!
I do not want you to forget
I know it will be very tough for us not to meet again and for me to forget about this.
But, you know, for some reason,
even if I return home, I will not forget about everyone here.
I have the feeling that I will definitely be able to come back here.
Rico, am I the first to know about this?
Yes, except for those in the research institute.
Well, could you do me a favor?
I would like to keep the facts that I will not be able to come back
and that I will lose my memories a secret from everyone.
I feel kind of lonely the minute I think about leaving.
If everyone says goodbye as if we will never meet again,
then I will feel that it will definitely happen.
That is why I want to go back home with the feeling that I can see everyone again someday.
Princess, you seem to be in a good mood.
Plus, I made up with Princess Leo again.
Besides, I will be going for a morning walk with Sink tomorrow.
That really is something to look forward to, right?
Captain, will Sir Hero be attending tomorrow's practice?
That is because you have been very close with him all this time.
He said that he would go to Fugetsu at noon, so he will probably come by in the morning.
Sir Hero will be coming over tomorrow, right?
He will be paying this little one a visit,
and he will also have a little sword practice with me.
I guess I will have to prepare a lot more for lunch then!
Why do not you cool the fruits in the well too?
We are done with the little things.
To go to Sink's with the three fools.
I just realized that I did not properly settle things with him yet.
Well, it is up to you.
I will visit Biscotti the following day myself.
Then I will just stay over there!
Sure, just do not give the people any trouble.
I see, so you have found a way to send Sink home?
Yes, so you will be in charge of the deportation ceremony in the morning three days from now.
He probably will not be able to come back right afterward, though.
Sink, it is my turn next!
You always seem to be carrying this around, huh?
Yeah, this is the prize from the competition that you saw through the star reading.
It is a memento for getting second place.
It must be an important treasure, right?
It is something sentimental and memorable.
Eclair, let us train together again!
I want to sharpen my sword skills!
Well, I guess you do not mind getting hurt, right?
How is the little fox doing?
As a land god myself, I am taking good care of him right now.
I am one of the land god's children.
You can honor me if you want.
My parents were killed by a demon long ago,
and with no place to go, I wandered around.
Then my lady decided to take me in.
I became a wanderer when a demon destroyed my country, too.
I never thought countries could get destroyed here in Flonyard.
Well, it is a story from roughly a hundred and fifty years ago.
For the last hundred years, the demon has not revealed itself.
So, there are not any dangerous disputes.
Both Yukikaze and I possess the power to seal demons.
We have made Biscotti our stronghold during these past few years.
Once in a while we visit other countries and seal demons there, too.
Does this mean that Lady d'Arquien is also a...
No, I am just a normal person.
Well, due to various circumstances, I had been able to live a rather long time.
How nice it would be if you could continue to stay here.
I could pass on my sword skills and sealing abilities, such as Flashing Fangs of the Divine Wolf.
At any rate, Flashing Fangs of the Divine Wolf is something that only she can use.
Somehow when you say that, it sounds very tempting!
Well, why do not I show it to you for a bit?
I guess it is really impossible to learn it all within one day.
It is a combination of Galette's famous delights.
Do take it back to your homeworld!
My sister said that it is for you.
There must be a way in which it will not end sadly for Sir Hero and everyone else.
But Sink has not lost either!
Sink, the next time Vert stands behind you, you would better be careful.
Well, why do not you go take a bath?
We will finish cleaning while you are at it.
Hm, this time it would be a separate bath for men and women.
This way to the men's bath, and this way to the women's bath.
I will not go wrong this time!
It is useful to learn after all!
Actually, the wrong sign was hung at the door!
I hope the only ones who entered here were ladies, right?
I am the only one here!
I will fix it right away!
could you stay like that for a while?
I have put on a towel.
Would you like to get in together?
When will you return here again?
That depends on how long I would stay.
If it is only a couple of days, then I can come during Golden Week.
If it is two weeks or longer, then it would have to be summer break.
It would be great if your friends could come along next time, too.
Do you still remember my name?
I cannot call you that in front of other people.
Well, it is not that I want you to call me otherwise.
I will be happy that you will remember my name and never forget it.
I have a pet name, Millhi.
But I really feel it is easier to call you Princess!
It is a simple gesture, but I wonder why I feel so happy!
Oh, I heard that you are going back home.
I wanted to thank you and practice with you after Gaul for a bit.
Then, when I visit next time...
It really is comfortable to be petted by Millhi.
Princess Leo's touch is unique too.
Her Highness is this kind of character?
Well, if it is about age, Princess Leo is slightly older,
but fundamentally, our princess is the older sister,
while Princess Leo is the younger sister, when they interact.
Why would I bring you if you were not?
Hey, everyone, Hero Sink has arrived!
Everyone in Frianno Castle, today, as per stated in the emergency notice,
Hero Sink, who has helped save our country from danger, will return to his homeworld tomorrow morning.
Hero Sink's exploits have added much color to the neighbor wars between Biscotti and Galette.
I am sure that everyone knows about this.
Although he will be going back to his homeworld, he is promised to come back again.
Next up, let us invite the main star of today's
Thank you Sir Hero gathering to say a word or two.
Where I come from, I am just a normal student.
However, the princess summoned me to Flonyard as a hero,
and then I fought with Prince Gaul and Princess Leo and participated in wars.
Do not forget that I exterminated a demon with the princess, too.
Aside from war activities, Leader of the Knights, Lady d'Arquien,
Captain of the Imperial Guard, Panettone,
Chief Elmar, Captain Rizel, and everyone on the maid's team,
You have all been so nice to me!
And the aunt from the canteen!
She always let Rico and me dine at the cafeteria.
I have had incredible experiences here.
Even when I return to my homeworld, I will never forget my experience here.
I will definitely come visit again soon!
If Biscotti and Flonyard face a pinch,
the hero, Sink, will appear no matter when!
everyone is happy laughter is what is most important.
